string-array.item: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild

string-array.name: description_array
string-array.item: Embark on an epic journey through Norse mythology as Kratos and his son, Atreus, face gods and monsters.
Travel through history and explore ancient civilizations as a member of the Assassin Brotherhood.
Step into a rich, open world as Geralt of Rivia, battling monsters and navigating moral choices.
Experience a dystopian future as V, a mercenary in the neon-lit streets of Night City.
Explore the American frontier with Arthur Morgan, confronting outlaws and survival challenges.
Uncover the mysteries of a post-apocalyptic world where robotic creatures dominate the land.
Discover Hyrule in an expansive open world, solving puzzles and uncovering secrets.
Face treacherous environments and brutal enemies in a dark and unforgiving world.
Journey through a gothic city filled with deadly foes and eldritch horrors.
Venture into the lands of Skyrim as the Dragonborn, fulfilling ancient prophecies and wielding powerful abilities.
